line.text: 'Утилизация корабля открывает часть исследований, необходимых для его чертежа.'

line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode reduces recycle factor by 20%.
* Mordan9 - Better default recycling from Capital Shipyard
* Add-Ons 1.2: Get the number of planets with the recycler effect. Each recycler gives 5% more recycling factor and 10% more research, stacking additively with other recyclers.
* Add-Ons 1.4.5: Patch exploit where missile and lasers that come with ships can be recycled for net profit in crystals and silicon (defeats the purpose of making silicon mines).
* Recycle factor when recycling lasers and missiles is 1/6 of the normal recycle factor. For OCV lasers, 1/100 of the normal recycling fcator.
* We want it displayed in X.Y% format since the costs are divided by 6 (see Mayhem.Costs.Laser and Mayhem.Costs.Missile).

line.text: 'Коэффициент утилизации для кораблей, станций и Плазменного лазера: '
'Коэффициент утилизации для большинства лазеров и всех ракет: '

line.comment: * do if $laser == {Alpha Kyon Emitter} OR $laser == {Beta Kyon Emitter} OR $laser == {Gamma Kyon Emitter}
* Zero Hour 1.10 - cannot recycle OCV lasers
* Add-Ons 1.4.6: Now recyclable but only at 1% recycle factor (the cost is divided by 50 in Mayhem.Costs.Laser)
* Mordan2, add Chaff to recycle menu. Apparently it's not considered a tradeable ware so won't be in the list of missiles.
* Mordan2, change heading to right alignment for "Selected" entry so it lines up nicely.
* qty = amount in the station at present
* current = amount you wish to sell.
* Mordan2, change line to right alignment for the selected fraction display so it lines up.
* Zero Hour 1.10 - cannot recycle OCV ships except to reverse engineer for up to 85% blueprint progress
* Add-Ons 1.1: Changed cap to 85%, in line with Mayhem.Recycle.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Phanon ships can now be recycled.
* $heading = columnize menu text: array= $heading, text= 'Stock', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 150
* $line = columnize menu text: array= $line, text= $qty, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 150

sval.val: Утилизация корабля открывает часть исследований, необходимых для его чертежа.
Коэффициент утилизации для кораблей, станций и Плазменного лазера:
Коэффициент утилизации для большинства лазеров и всех ракет:
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode reduces recycle factor by 20%.
Mordan9 - Better default recycling from Capital Shipyard
Add-Ons 1.2: Get the number of planets with the recycler effect. Each recycler gives 5% more recycling factor and 10% more research, stacking additively with other recyclers.
Add-Ons 1.4.5: Patch exploit where missile and lasers that come with ships can be recycled for net profit in crystals and silicon (defeats the purpose of making silicon mines).
Recycle factor when recycling lasers and missiles is 1/6 of the normal recycle factor. For OCV lasers, 1/100 of the normal recycling fcator.
We want it displayed in X.Y% format since the costs are divided by 6 (see Mayhem.Costs.Laser and Mayhem.Costs.Missile).
do if $laser == {Alpha Kyon Emitter} OR $laser == {Beta Kyon Emitter} OR $laser == {Gamma Kyon Emitter}
Zero Hour 1.10 - cannot recycle OCV lasers
Add-Ons 1.4.6: Now recyclable but only at 1% recycle factor (the cost is divided by 50 in Mayhem.Costs.Laser)
Mordan2, add Chaff to recycle menu. Apparently it's not considered a tradeable ware so won't be in the list of missiles.
Mordan2, change heading to right alignment for "Selected" entry so it lines up nicely.
qty = amount in the station at present
current = amount you wish to sell.
Mordan2, change line to right alignment for the selected fraction display so it lines up.
Zero Hour 1.10 - cannot recycle OCV ships except to reverse engineer for up to 85% blueprint progress
Add-Ons 1.1: Changed cap to 85%, in line with Mayhem.Recycle.
Add-Ons 1.2: Phanon ships can now be recycled.
$heading = columnize menu text: array= $heading, text= 'Stock', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 150
$line = columnize menu text: array= $line, text= $qty, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 150
